name: Sweet Candy Bomb
description:
Here comes the deliciously organic and hit candy matching game. Switch and match at least 3 identical candies to blast. Collect cookies and lollipops for the preparation of tough situation. Be sure to share the fun with your friends.

Features:
- A stunning 240 tasty levels of candy marching sweetness
-Travel trough magical lands
-Amazing arsenal for props and power-ups
-Uniquely interesting obstacles such as cake, honey, chocolate and ice cube.
-Addictive and classic match 3 gameplay
-Rich visual graphics and in-game experience
-Easy to start, challenging but rewarding to fully master

Discover the bright and fun levels in Sweet Candy Bomb!
